content:
<table-wrap id="tbl1" position="float">
<label>1</label>
<caption>
<title>Comparison of the Maximum Relative
Sensitivities (<italic>S</italic>
<sub>r</sub>) between the present
CsPbBr<sub>3</sub>@Eu-BTC Material and Other Similar Thermometers</title>
</caption>
<oasis:table colsep="0" rowsep="0">
<oasis:tgroup cols="4">
<oasis:colspec align="left" colname="col1"></oasis:colspec>
<oasis:colspec align="left" colname="col2"></oasis:colspec>
<oasis:colspec align="left" colname="col3"></oasis:colspec>
<oasis:colspec align="left" colname="col4"></oasis:colspec>
<oasis:thead>
<oasis:row>
<oasis:entry align="center">material</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry align="center">temp range</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry align="center">max <italic>S</italic>
<sub>r</sub>
</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry align="center">ref</oasis:entry>
</oasis:row>
</oasis:thead>
<oasis:tbody>
<oasis:row>
<oasis:entry>Eu-MOF/Zn<sub>2</sub>GeO<sub>4</sub>:Mn<sup>2+</sup>
</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>20–90 °C</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>4.1 % °C<sup>–1</sup>
</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>
<xref ref-type="bibr" rid="ref14" specific-use="ref-style=base-text"></xref>
</oasis:entry>
</oasis:row>
<oasis:row>
<oasis:entry>Rh101@UiO-67</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>25–45 °C</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>1.19% °C<sup>–1</sup>
</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>
<xref ref-type="bibr" rid="ref40" specific-use="ref-style=base-text"></xref>
</oasis:entry>
</oasis:row>
<oasis:row>
<oasis:entry>UiO-66(Zr&Eu)
film</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>237–337 K</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>4.26% K<sup>–1</sup>
</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>
<xref ref-type="bibr" rid="ref41" specific-use="ref-style=base-text"></xref>
</oasis:entry>
</oasis:row>
<oasis:row>
<oasis:entry>Tb<sub>0.95</sub>Eu<sub>0.05</sub>(btb)</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>10–320 K</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>2.85% K<sup>–1</sup>
</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>
<xref ref-type="bibr" rid="ref42" specific-use="ref-style=base-text"></xref>
</oasis:entry>
</oasis:row>
<oasis:row>
<oasis:entry>TbMOF@3%Eu_tfac</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>225–375 K</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>2.59% K<sup>–1</sup>
</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>
<xref ref-type="bibr" rid="ref43" specific-use="ref-style=base-text"></xref>
</oasis:entry>
</oasis:row>
<oasis:row>
<oasis:entry>Zn<sub>1.90</sub>GeO<sub>4</sub>:0.02Mn<sup>2+</sup>,0.08Eu<sup>3+</sup>
</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>20–80 °C</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>1.96% °C<sup>–1</sup>
</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>
<xref ref-type="bibr" rid="ref44" specific-use="ref-style=base-text"></xref>
</oasis:entry>
</oasis:row>
<oasis:row>
<oasis:entry>Ca<sub>8</sub>ZnLa(PO<sub>4</sub>)<sub>7</sub>:Tb<sup>3+</sup>, Eu<sup>3+</sup>
</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>298–448 K</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>0.53% K<sup>–1</sup>
</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>
<xref ref-type="bibr" rid="ref45" specific-use="ref-style=base-text"></xref>
</oasis:entry>
</oasis:row>
<oasis:row>
<oasis:entry>(Ca,Sr)<sub>10</sub>Li(PO<sub>4</sub>)<sub>7</sub>:Ce<sup>3+</sup>,Mn<sup>2+</sup>
</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>293–473 K</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>0.40% K<sup>–1</sup>
</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>
<xref ref-type="bibr" rid="ref46" specific-use="ref-style=base-text"></xref>
</oasis:entry>
</oasis:row>
<oasis:row>
<oasis:entry>CsPbBr<sub>3</sub>@Eu-BTC</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>20–100 °C</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>3.9% °C<sup>–1</sup>
</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>this work</oasis:entry>
</oasis:row>
</oasis:tbody>
</oasis:tgroup>
</oasis:table>
</table-wrap>
clean_text:
Table 1. Comparison of the Maximum Relative Sensitivities (S<sub>r</sub>) between the present CsPbBr<sub>3</sub>@Eu-BTC Material and Other Similar Thermometers

| material | temp range | max S<sub>r</sub> | ref |
|----------|------------|------------------|-----|
| Eu-MOF/Zn<sub>2</sub>GeO<sub>4</sub>:Mn<sup>2+</sup> | 20–90 °C | 4.1 % °C<sup>–1</sup> | [14] |
| Rh101@UiO-67 | 25–45 °C | 1.19% °C<sup>–1</sup> | [40] |
| UiO-66(Zr&Eu) film | 237–337 K | 4.26% K<sup>–1</sup> | [41] |
| Tb<sub>0.95</sub>Eu<sub>0.05</sub>(btb) | 10–320 K | 2.85% K<sup>–1</sup> | [42] |
| TbMOF@3%Eu_tfac | 225–375 K | 2.59% K<sup>–1</sup> | [43] |
| Zn<sub>1.90</sub>GeO<sub>4</sub>:0.02Mn<sup>2+</sup>,0.08Eu<sup>3+</sup> | 20–80 °C | 1.96% °C<sup>–1</sup> | [44] |
| Ca<sub>8</sub>ZnLa(PO<sub>4</sub>)<sub>7</sub>:Tb<sup>3+</sup>, Eu<sup>3+</sup> | 298–448 K | 0.53% K<sup>–1</sup> | [45] |
| (Ca,Sr)<sub>10</sub>Li(PO<sub>4</sub>)<sub>7</sub>:Ce<sup>3+</sup>,Mn<sup>2+</sup> | 293–473 K | 0.40% K<sup>–1</sup> | [46] |
| CsPbBr<sub>3</sub>@Eu-BTC | 20–100 °C | 3.9% °C<sup>–1</sup> | this work |
